original: You found some bits of earth-like debris near the west-ward balcony. They have traces of transmutation magic on them. This also happens to be where Theon Archeus saw Aria Steelwind dumping Coraline Sibyl’s body.
translation: 你在西侧阳台附近找到的土块残片，上面附着有形变魔法的痕迹。这里也是阿莉亚·斯蒂尔文德被希恩·阿契厄斯目击，丢弃卡洛琳·希比尔尸体的地方。
